result.name: Expression quantitative loci (eQTL) analyses for bovine blood and liver
result.description: To identify expression quantitative loci (eQTL) operating in bovine blood and liver, 238 animals were genotyped uisng Illumina BovineHD genotyping arrary (777K SNPs). The genotypes were further imputed to whole genome level using 264 sequenced Holstein animals as reference.
result.center: GIGA Institute, University of Liege; Irish Cattle Breeding Federation Society Limited
